name: Project Room
description:
Created in VGDC sprint game jam as a learning project for Unreal, finally got time to post a publish build!

Jam Theme: "Betrayal"

We decided to take as that the game has betrayed you - because they thinks you betrayed them. For each level, you have to figure out the game's lie in order to get out of the rooms.  

Control:

Move: WASD, Space

E to interact

Alt+F4 to Exit

Credit:

James Bates - Lead Designer

Elanna Tang - Level Designer

Nichole - Gameplay Programmer
